weekly_top_story.headline: EU-India Seal 'Mother Of All Deals'
weekly_top_story.summary: The European Union and India have concluded a major trade and diplomatic agreement, marking a significant geopolitical realignment as nations seek alternatives to U.S.-led economic structures amid rising protectionist policies.

stories.headline: President Trump Warns Iraq Against Appointing Nouri al-Maliki as Prime Minister
stories.summary: Trump threatened to withhold U.S. support if Iraq appoints pro-Iran figure Nouri al-Maliki as prime minister, illustrating escalating tensions over regional geopolitical alignment and U.S. influence.

stories.headline: Canadian PM Carney Stands Firm on Davos Remarks Despite Trump's 100% Tariff Threat
stories.summary: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney reaffirmed his World Economic Forum call for nations to diversify away from U.S. dominance, standing his ground after Trump threatened punitive 100% tariffs over Canada's China trade deal.

stories.headline: ASEAN Foreign Ministers to Address Myanmar Peace Plan and Elections in Cebu Retreat
stories.summary: ASEAN foreign ministers convened under Philippine leadership to discuss Myanmar's recently concluded elections and ongoing peace efforts, addressing critical regional stability challenges.
